ISSUE.TITLE: Read Only Users Receive The Permission Error Modal When View a Query
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary When creating a read only group and then assigning a read only user to that group. The user cannot view the query that is part of that group without receive permission error modal popup. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Remove all data sources from default 2. Create a new group called "Read Only" and connect the datasources as "View Only" 3. Create or add a user to this group 4. Navigate to the Queries > Queries page 5. Click on any query from the "All Queries" 6. On the query detail page the permissions error will popup Note: you are able to create a new dashboard and add the query results to your dashboard ### Technical details: - Redash Version: Version 0.10.1+b1836 - Browser/OS: Chrome / OSX - How did you install Redash: via AMI

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Mention Extended JSON support in MongoDB docs.
